paragraphs.content: Chapter 5
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 5

paragraphs.content: This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;
paragraphs.contentHtml: This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;

paragraphs.content: Male and female created he them; and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Male and female created he them; and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a son in his own likeness, after his image; and called his name Seth:
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a son in his own likeness, after his image; and called his name Seth:

paragraphs.content: And the days of Adam after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years: and he begat sons and daughters:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the days of Adam after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years: and he begat sons and daughters:

paragraphs.content: And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died.

paragraphs.content: And Seth lived an hundred and five years, and begat Enos:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Seth lived an hundred and five years, and begat Enos:

paragraphs.content: And Seth lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Seth lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters:

paragraphs.content: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years: and he died.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years: and he died.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And Enos lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And Enos lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:

paragraphs.content: And Enos lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat sons and daughters:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Enos lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat sons and daughters:

paragraphs.content: And all the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years: and he died.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And all the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years: and he died.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And Cainan lived seventy years, and begat Mahalaleel:
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And Cainan lived seventy years, and begat Mahalaleel:

paragraphs.content: And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:

paragraphs.content: And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years: and he died.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years: and he died.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And Mahalaleel lived sixty and five years, and begat Jared:
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And Mahalaleel lived sixty and five years, and begat Jared:

paragraphs.content: And Mahalaleel lived after he begat Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Mahalaleel lived after he begat Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters:

paragraphs.content: And all the days of Mahalaleel were eight hundred ninety and five years: and he died.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And all the days of Mahalaleel were eight hundred ninety and five years: and he died.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And Jared lived an hundred sixty and two years, and he begat Enoch:
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And Jared lived an hundred sixty and two years, and he begat Enoch:

paragraphs.content: And Jared lived after he begat Enoch eight hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Jared lived after he begat Enoch eight hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:

paragraphs.content: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty and two years: and he died.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty and two years: and he died.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And Enoch lived sixty and five years, and begat Methuselah:
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And Enoch lived sixty and five years, and begat Methuselah:

paragraphs.content: And Enoch walked with God after he begat Methuselah three hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Enoch walked with God after he begat Methuselah three hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:

paragraphs.content: And all the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty and five years:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And all the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty and five years:

paragraphs.content: And Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him.

paragraphs.content: And Methuselah lived an hundred eighty and seven years, and begat Lamech:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Methuselah lived an hundred eighty and seven years, and begat Lamech:

paragraphs.content: And Methuselah lived after he begat Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begat sons and daughters:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Methuselah lived after he begat Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begat sons and daughters:

paragraphs.content: And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years: and he died.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years: and he died.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And Lamech lived an hundred eighty and two years, and begat a son:
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And Lamech lived an hundred eighty and two years, and begat a son:

paragraphs.content: And he called his name Noah, saying, This same shall comfort us concerning our work and toil of our hands, because of the ground which the LORD hath cursed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he called his name Noah, saying, This same shall comfort us concerning our work and toil of our hands, because of the ground which the Lord hath cursed.

paragraphs.content: And Lamech lived after he begat Noah five hundred ninety and five years, and begat sons and daughters:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Lamech lived after he begat Noah five hundred ninety and five years, and begat sons and daughters:

paragraphs.content: And all the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years: and he died.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And all the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years: and he died.

paragraphs.content: And Noah was five hundred years old: and Noah begat Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Noah was five hundred years old: and Noah begat Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
